price: (42) Or do they intend a plan? But those who disbelieve - they are the object of a plan.
arabic: أَمۡ يُرِيدُونَ كَيۡدٗاۖ فَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ هُمُ ٱلۡمَكِيدُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: am yurīdūna kaydan fa-alladhīna kafarū humu al-makīdūna
